testcase.name: Validate user is able to Add to Cart using valid data - Example #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given Chrome is opened and AsianPaints app is opened........................passed When User clicks on Shop Section............................................passed Then User navigates on the Shop Page........................................passed And User clicks on Wallstickers.............................................passed Then User navigates to the Wallstickers page................................passed When User clicks on sort by Field...........................................passed And User selects Priority- Low to High......................................passed Then Application sorts the wall stickers list based on price................passed And User clicks on any particular sticker...................................passed Then User enters the pincode from sheetname "Sheet1" and rownumber 0........passed Then Add to Cart button is successfully clicked.............................passed

testcase.name: Validate user is able to Add to Cart using invalid data - Example #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given Chrome is opened and AsianPaints app is opened........................passed When User clicks on Shop Section............................................passed Then User navigates on the Shop Page........................................passed And User clicks on Wallstickers.............................................passed Then User navigates to the Wallstickers page................................passed When User clicks on sort by Field...........................................passed And User selects Priority- Low to High......................................passed Then Application sorts the wall stickers list based on price................passed And User clicks on any particular sticker...................................passed Then User enters the pincode from sheetname "Sheet1" and rownumber 1........passed Then Add to Cart button is unsuccessfully clicked...........................passed
